metadata.title: CVE-2015-2688 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
buf_pullup in Tor before 0.2.4.26 and 0.2.5.x before 0.2.5.11 does notproperly handle unexpected arrival times of buffers with invalid layouts,which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (assertionfailure and daemon exit) via crafted packets.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-2688` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tor - 0.2.6.10-1
tor-geoipdb - 0.2.6.10-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: tor package in esm-apps/xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.2.6.10-1').
